name: Never Gonna give You Up - The Game
name_original: Never Gonna give You Up - The Game
description:
It's a game boy game (.gb), inspired by Rick Astley Never Gonna Give You Up music video.
This is a mod of "Office Combat" by Robert Doman : https://r-doman.itch.io/office-combat

Rick Astley must reach is beloved at night-club. As he travels through the city, many people will slow him down.

Just for fun ! I hope Rick Astley sees this game ! :)

-------

C'est un jeu game boy (.gb), inspiré par le clip de Rick Astley : Never Gonna Give You Up.
C'est un mod du jeu "Office Combat" de Robert Doman : https://r-doman.itch.io/office-combat

Rick Astley doit rejoindre sa bien-aimée dans un night-club. Alors qu'il parcourt la ville, plusieurs personnes vont le retarder.

Juste pour le fun ! J'espère que Rick Astley verra ce jeu ! :)
